ModMetaData.name: Premarital Sex
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPonyta
ModMetaData.description:
Did you notice after you installed Ideology that most people don't want to even so much as share a bed before marriage? Are they breaking up with each other before they even make it to marriage because they aren't getting that opinion boost from lovin'? Yes. Unless you're custom-designing the details of each ideology you play.
This mod just makes free physical love the default. You can still pick the spouse only options if you want.
